entry.detail: Loaded documentation files and prepared build plan from markdown guides.
Detected existing folder football-reservation-app. Proceeding to install dependencies in-place.

Installed runtime deps: prisma, @prisma/client, next-auth, @auth/prisma-adapter, react-hook-form, zod, @hookform/resolvers, @radix-ui/react-dialog, lucide-react, date-fns, axios, nodemailer, @types/nodemailer. Skipped @radix-ui/react-calendar (not found).
Added dev deps: @types/node, jest, @testing-library/react, @testing-library/jest-dom, eslint-config-prettier, prettier.
Ran prisma init; created prisma/schema.prisma and configured datasource.
Added models: User, Field, Reservation, FieldAvailability, WeatherCache; enums for City, SurfaceType, ReservationStatus, Role; indexes and relations per docs.
Created prisma/seed.js with initial fields and availability for Tunis and Ariana.
Updated package.json scripts, added jest.config.js and jest.setup.js, added weather and prisma lib files.
Added initial handlers: GET /api/fields, GET /api/weather/forecast, GET/POST /api/reservations.
Added FieldCard, FieldList, and ReservationForm components with basic styling and validation.
Added supabase/schema.sql with tables, enums, and RLS; added src/lib/supabaseClient.ts; installed @supabase/supabase-js.
Created src/app/page.tsx to list fields via /api/fields and replace Next.js default page.
